website_summaries.verdict: The response for the Brooks Revel 2 was generally positive.  Runners admired the comfortable feel, exact sizing, soft cushioning and lightweight design of the neutral running shoe. The affordable price and eye-catching colors were also highlighted in some reviews. Overall, the Revel 2 is indeed a successful release.
pros: Many runners thought that Brooks Revel 2 is a very comfortable shoe
Some wearers found the fit to be true to size
According to some users, the cushioning of the shoe is soft and bouncy
Most users found the Revel 2 to be a lightweight shoe
Several purchasers admired the shoes street-ready design and eye-catching colors
A few users mentioned that the shoe offers great heel support
The Brooks Revel 2 is a versatile shoe that performed well both as running gear and lifestyle shoe
cons: According to a tester, the outer edges of the façade ripped apart after only a few days of use

customer_reviews.title: Good Road Trainer
customer_reviews.text: Just tried out the Brooks Revel 2 and the Aonije 2ltr Hydration Pack. Trainer's: felt light and good cushioned suppot on the heel. I tend to be heavy on the heel so these felt really nice. Surface ran on was road and pavement. Condition was wet and the grip was good, didn't feel like I was going to slip going round corners. Size are a medium width and went a size up. Enough room for swelling but not too much to cause rubbing All in all, great low-mid price item
customer_reviews.author: stuart

customer_reviews.title: Great road-running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Have worn Brooks before so when I needed new road shoes I had a lot of confidence buying these. They arrived Wednesday, I wore them around the house until Saturday and then Sunday got a half-marathon PB in them. Very comfortable, lots of support. I buy them one size larger than my regular work shoes and the fit is perfect allowing some space for when your feet swell in a long run.
customer_reviews.author: RichT

customer_reviews.title: These are proper trainers
customer_reviews.text: Before buying these Revel 2 trainers I tried on many different makes of training shoe. None felt as comfortable and secure as the Brooks. I wore Brooks years ago and had forgotten just how good they are. I normally wear a size 9, but ordered a 9.5 which was just right. I have now bought another pair of Brooks the GTS19 Adrenaline and they are even better than the Revel 2, but are more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Burton

customer_reviews.title: I work standing up all night and these are the best shoes l have used!
customer_reviews.text: The best shoe for wide feet and collapsed arches. Half sizes, brilliant! I bought 2 more pairs!!! These shoes still look good a year later! I work standing up all night and these are the best shoes l have used ! Good strong stiff upper heel too!
customer_reviews.author: Walby Church

customer_reviews.title: Very good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant shoes, if you want to buy them always bought half size bigger, I'm wearing a UK size 7,5 so I ordered a size 8 and they fit perfect. I suffer of tendinitis(Brooks ADRENALINE are perfect for my problem) and brooks shoes has helped me with this problem as atm are the only shoes I wear at work and in my spare time and they are very comfortable too. This model(Revel 2)I used for aerobics-gym. Very quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Helen P.

product_meta.title: Brooks Men's Revel 2 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The perfect mix of street style and high performance. With its pleated knit upper that wraps around the foot, the Revel 2 offers comfortable, soft cushioning and a trendy look that's perfect for any situation, while running or when you're in town. The shock absorbing midsole in BioMoGo DNA adapts dynamically to every step. The segmented Crash Pad at the heel offers soft transitions.
feature_bullets: The updated flat-knit upper provides a new look and feel that's perfect for work, working out, or post-work activities.
Enjoy the secure fit of an inner bootie that surrounds your foot in all-day comfort.
BioMoGo DNA, our proprietary cushioning, adapts to your stride, weight and speed. Why? So it can protect you by deflecting impact away from your body.
A Heel Segmented Crash Pad promotes smooth transitions.
Heat-activated yarns ensure the flat knit keeps it shape, preventing stretching over time.
